Package oopds.assignment.DC.controllers

Class DonationDistributedController

java.lang.Object
oopds.assignment.DC.controllers.DonationDistributedController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") @CrossOrigin public class DonationDistributedController extends Object
A Controller is a Class that controls the operations of the web service by creating a REST API. This Controller is responsible for Controlling operations for DonationDistributed objects. Operations such as changing status of the Donation Distributed is found here.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/donation-distributed") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DataResponse<?>> getAll()
      This is a HTTP Get method to get all donation distributed available in the database.
      Returns:
      A List of all Donations Distributed in the database.

    • updateStatus

      @PatchMapping("/donation-distributed/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DataResponse<?>> updateStatus(@RequestBody @PathVariable("id") UUID id, String newStatus)
      This is a HTTP Patch Request to update the status of a donation distributed item.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Donation Distributed object.
      newStatus - The new status of the object to be updated.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity object containing a message indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • getAllByStatus

      @GetMapping("/donation-distributed/{status}") public List<DonationDistributed> getAllByStatus(@PathVariable("status") String status)
      This is a HTTP GET method to get a List of Donation Distributed based on the specific status requested.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to be searched for.
      Returns:
      A List of Donation Distributed that matched the request.

    • getAllByDonorId

      @GetMapping("/donation-distributed/by-donor-id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DataResponse<?>> getAllByDonorId(@PathVariable("id") UUID id)
      This is a HTTP GET method to get a List of Donation Distributed/Made with the specified Donor Id.
      Parameters:
      id - The Donor Id to be searched for.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity object that contains all of the donations distributed/made related with the Donor Id passed.

    • getAllByNgoId

      @GetMapping("/donation-distributed/by-ngo-id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DataResponse<?>> getAllByNgoId(@PathVariable("id") UUID id)
      This is HTTP GET method to get a List of Donation Distributed/Requested with the specified Ngo Id.
      Parameters:
      id - The Ngo Id to be searched for.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity object that contains all of the donations distributed/requested related with the Ngo Id passed.
